Posts.Content: boot2aboot wrote: found a golf ball residing in my armpit last week...and rushed to the ONC...can't believe i could have a lump this size after a clean November mammo...what is scary is the lump is in my lymph nodes...ONC performed a core and FNB, bone scan and abdominal CT, mammo...she really didn't find anything on mammo...now, i am waiting...feel like i am on death row right now and have no idea what i am going to say when i get (expecting) bad news...i am not only freaked out about C, but also freaked out by what is going to happen to my bank account...now i could kick myself for not going ahead with PBR and Hyster...i can't seem to concentrate on anything right now... Posts.Content: Apr 14, 2011 11:27PM boot2aboot wrote: i was supposed to have them Wednesday...i've only found out my brca2 status 2 yrs ago when my sis developed BC...stage lll...she is an eternal optimist which i believe, helped her very much... )i am Â a natural born pessimist...
